title: MIPCOM Deal Wrap: Lionsgate, Banijay, Cineflix Ink Intl. Sales for Factual Formats
summary: Lionsgate racked up sales across its unscripted slate, which includes music doc 'Andrea Bocelli: Because I Believe,' soccer star format 'Married to the Game,' and food travel show 'Tony Shalhoub Breaking Bread.'

title: The Best Beauty Advent Calendars of 2025: Dior, Diptyque and More Limited-Edition Launches
summary: Organized by price, these curated cosmetic countdowns are the easiest, most cost-effective and, undeniably, most exciting way to stock up on the best of beauty for yourself and your favorite makeup mavens.
